Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • ly.img.android.acs.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Complex Camera Wrapper, for simple Camera use

      • setFlashMode

        @Nullable
public FlashMode setFlashMode(FlashMode mode)
        Try to set a flash mode and take a fallback mode if not supported by current Camera.
        Parameters:
        mode - flash mode.
        Returns:
        return the accepted mode, it can be the same as requested or a supported fallback mode.
